description: Erection of a single storey extension, to the side and rear of the main building and alterations to the roof of ground floor back addition; excavation of the front and rear garden to form lightwells in connection with the creation of a new basement; erection of an external staircase from basement to ground floor level at the rear of the property; installation of 2no rooflights, replacement of existing dormer windows with new dormer windows involving an increase in the ridge height of the new dormers by 200mm in the front and rear roofslopes; installation of 1no window to the front elevation of hip to gable feature; infilling of the existing windows to the rear elevation of first floor level and to the side of the main building, and installation of 3no new windows at first floor level to the rear elevation and new windows to the side elevation of the main building; installation of a new door opening and a new electric vehicle charging point at the side of main building; installation of new double doors to replace the existing door and window at ground floor level to the front elevation. Erection of a rear extension at first floor level over part of the existing back addition.
borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
